channel.title: Emma Frost on
channel.description: Recent content in Emma Frost on

item.title: Bleu
item.description: Bleu is a male we picked up from the Stryfe line. He was raised by Jeremy Booker at Brightside Chameleons, and he was a bit of a challenge to work with. We released him in early 2020 and only produced a few clutches with him. We hope to select some nice males from his offspring to bring that line into our project. Bleu Bleu1 Bleu2 Filial F3-CG11 Sire Stryfe Dam Emma Frost 5 Generation Tree
